column4: Hey.. I have a problem installing Ubuntu on my laptop. I boot from the CD, and when the first menu pops up, i press <enter> for the default install. BUT after the initial uncompressing, the screen goes black, and nothing happens... - I have tried with different Ubuntu-vers., and it is the same result..
try booting with VGA support off
how do i do that? - in the install-menu?
on the first screen that you see. i forget the exact keypress but i think one of the help screen explains how to add arguments
